metadata.title: CVE-2024-1816 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 12.0 prior to 16.11.5, starting from 17.0 prior to 17.0.3, andstarting from 17.1 prior to 17.1.1, which allows for an attacker to cause adenial of service using a crafted OpenAPI file.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
